solution_line_template: Roger will need {team_members} + {coaches} + {helpers} = <<{team_members}+{coaches}+{helpers}={total_pouches_needed}>>{total_pouches_needed} pouches of trail mix.

If you divide the amount of trail mix pouches by the amount in each pack, {total_pouches_needed} / {pouches_per_pack} = <<{total_pouches_needed}/{pouches_per_pack}={packs_needed}>>{packs_needed} packs of trail mix.
